titles.title: O For A Thousand Tongues To Sing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O for a thousand tongues to sing newline My great Redeemer's praise, newline The glories of my God and King, newline The triumphs of His grace!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: My gracious Master and my God, newline Assist me to proclaim, newline To spread through all the earth abroad, newline The honors of Thy name.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Jesus! The name that charms our fears, newline That bids our sorrows cease; newline 'Tis music in the sinner's ears; newline 'Tis life, and health, and peace.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: He breaks the power of canceled sin; newline He sets the prisoner free. newline His blood can make the foulest clean; newline His blood availed for me.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Hear Him, ye deaf, His praise, ye dumb, newline Your loosened tongues employ. newline Ye blind, behold your Savior come, newline And leap ye lame for joy.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Glory to God and praise and love newline Be ever, ever giv'n newline By saints below and saints above newline The church in earth and heav'n.
